titleStmt.title: The Persecution of them people they call Quakers, in several places in Lanchashire [sic].
titleStmt.author: Addamson, William, 17th cent.

notesStmt.note: A collection of accounts by Quaker authors, the first signed by William Addamson.
This tract bound with items from the Thomason collection printed in 1656. Thomason purchased it Feb. 19 1656. However, Wing dates item 1655.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
